TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DeclarativeCatalogPart extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart
Public NotInheritable Class DeclarativeCatalogPart Inherits CatalogPart

summary.span: Enables developers to add a catalog of or other server controls to a Web page in the declarative, page persistence format.

span.span: Enables developers to add a catalog of or other server controls to a Web page in the declarative, page persistence format.

summary.span: This class cannot be inherited.

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 就像 Web 組件控制項集合中有工具導向的區域 (如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 類別概觀)，有工具導向控制項，以及這些控制項，必須位於特定類型的工具區域。Just as there are tool-oriented zones in the Web Parts control set (for details, see the class overview), there are tool-oriented controls, and each of these controls must reside in a certain type of tool zone. Web 組件控制項集合中的工具為導向的組件控制項有兩個特殊的特性：Tool-oriented part controls in the Web Parts control set have two distinguishing characteristics: - 它們是協助程式控制項，可讓使用者個人化的 Web 組件頁面上的控制項。They are helper controls that enable end users to personalize controls on a Web Parts page. - 它們只會顯示在特定顯示模式。They are visible only in certain display modes. 為組件控制項必須位於類型的區域，例如Web 組件控制集所提供的區域。 is a part control that must reside in a type of zone, such as the zone provided with the Web Parts control set. 就會看到控制項只當網頁處於目錄顯示模式。The control becomes visible only when a Web page is in catalog display mode. 控制項可讓開發人員將一組伺服器控制項加入以宣告方式在網頁上的目錄。The control provides a way for developers to add a set of server controls declaratively to a catalog on a Web page. 一個類別目錄，在 Web 組件控制項集合中，是只要一份或其他伺服器控制項時會顯示的頁面是在目錄中顯示模式。A catalog, in the Web Parts control set, is simply a list of or other server controls that is visible when a page is in catalog display mode. 使用者可以從清單中選取控制項，並將它們新增至網頁，有效地讓使用者能夠變更控制項與頁面上的功能集。A user can select controls from the list and add them to the Web page, which effectively gives users the ability to change the set of controls and the functionality on a page. > [!NOTE] > 使用者可以在目錄中新增多個相同的控制項執行個體至網頁。Users can add multiple instances of the same control in a catalog to a Web page. 使用的優點建立類別目錄的伺服器控制項的控制項是，它不需要撰寫任何程式碼。An advantage of using a control to create a catalog of server controls is that it does not require any coding. 網頁程式開發人員可以使用完全以宣告的控制項 （或頁面持續性） 格式，因此控制項的名稱。Page developers can work with the control entirely in the declarative (or page persistence) format, hence the name of the control. 控制項有一個實用的屬性，可讓開發人員設定的控制項，可用於整個網站整個目錄。The control has a useful property that allows developers to set up a catalog of controls that can be used throughout an entire site. 而不是宣告內的個別伺服器控制項控制項，開發人員可以設定至使用者控制項，其中包含應該在目錄中的伺服器控制項的清單的路徑的屬性值。Rather than declare individual server controls within a control, a developer can set the property value to the path of a user control that contains the list of server controls that should be in the catalog. 在執行階段，目錄中會載入使用者控制項中所參考的伺服器控制項。At run time, the server controls referenced in the user control are loaded in the catalog. 如此一來，多個網頁或網站可以參考相同的使用者控制項，建立類別目錄。In this way, multiple pages or sites could reference the same user control to create a catalog. 更新的伺服器控制項的使用者控制項的清單時，它會更新使用者控制項為基礎的所有全文檢索目錄。When the user control's list of server controls is updated, it would update all catalogs based on the user control. 類別具有公用屬性，以覆寫繼承的屬性數目。The class has a number of public properties that override the inherited properties. 大部分的這些屬性不會實際用於轉譯控制項中，覆寫，則只有以便可以在其上設定特殊的程式碼屬性，以將其從等的設計工具中隱藏[!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/includes/vsprvsext-md.md)]。Most of these properties are not actually used for rendering the control; they are overridden only so that special code attributes can be set on them to hide them from design tools like [!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/includes/vsprvsext-md.md)]. 您不應該使用這些隱藏的屬性，因為它們會有不會影響轉譯。You should not use these hidden properties, as they have no effect on rendering. IntelliSense 會隱藏它們，並在 Visual Studio 中的 [屬性] 窗格可協助開發人員避免不小心使用這些事實。The fact that they are hidden from IntelliSense and the Properties pane in Visual Studio helps developers avoid using them by mistake. 所有這些隱藏的屬性會註明因此在其各自的說明主題。All these hidden properties are noted as such in their respective Help topics. 類別也有數種方法。The class also has several methods. 方法擷取每個物件在目錄中，可讓控制項控制項來顯示每個伺服器控制項的相關資訊，而不需要建立它的執行個體。The method retrieves a object for each control in the catalog, which enables a control to display information about each server control without having to create an instance of it. 另一個方法是方法。Another method is the method. 這個方法會取得特定的執行個體傳遞給方法的描述為基礎的控制項。This method gets an instance of a particular control, based on the description passed to the method. > [!NOTE] > 若要改善協助工具，內呈現控制項`
`項目。To improve accessibility, the control is rendered within a `
` element. `
`項目群組相關之控制項集合中用來在編輯控制項，以及它可協助視覺化使用者代理程式 （例如，一般的網頁瀏覽器） 和語音導向的使用者代理程式 （在這些控制項之間的索引標籤式瀏覽例如，螢幕讀取軟體）。The `
` element groups the related set of controls used for editing in the control, and it facilitates tabbed navigation among those controls for both visual user agents (such as ordinary Web browsers) and speech-oriented user agents (such as screen-reading software). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用以宣告方式在網頁上的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the control declaratively on a Web page. 此範例包含四個部分：The example has four parts: - 使用者控制項，可讓您變更 Web 組件頁面上的顯示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 包含網頁控制項和控制項。A Web page that contains a control and a control. - 原始程式碼檔，其中包含兩個自訂控制項。A source code file that contains two custom controls. - 在瀏覽器頁面載入時，此範例的運作方式的說明。An explanation of how the example works when you load the page in a browser. 此程式碼範例的第一個部分是使用者控制項，可讓您變更頁面上的顯示模式。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables you to change display modes on the page. For 詳細資料會顯示在此控制項模式和原始碼的描述，請參閱[逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上顯示的模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Overview#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Overview/CS/DisplayModeMenuCS.ascx#7)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Overview#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Overview/VB/DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx#7)] 在程式碼範例的第二個部分是網頁。The second part of the code example is the Web page. 在頁面頂端的兩個`Register`指示詞，一個用於使用者控制項，一個用於編譯過的元件包含兩個自訂控制項。At the top of the page are two `Register` directives, one for the user control and one for the compiled component that contains the two custom controls. 請注意頁面都有的宣告式參考控制項，如本主題的 < 備註 > 一節中所述，適當的宣告式的項目階層內巢狀。Notice that the page has a declarative reference to the control, nested within the proper hierarchy of declarative elements as described in the Remarks section of this topic. ``項目包含``項目，其中又包含標準 ASP.NET 參考控制項和兩個自訂控制項，這些是使用者可以從目錄選取的控制項。The `` element contains a `` element, which in turn contains references for a standard ASP.NET control and the two custom controls; these are the controls that users can select from the catalog. 這個頁面也包含編輯功能，與控制項與頁面上宣告。The page also contains editing capability, with a control declared on the page. 這個控制項可讓使用者編輯某些屬性上自訂控制已加入至頁面之後，使用者切換至編輯模式頁面之後。This control enables users to edit certain properties on the custom controls after they have been added to the page, and after the user has switched the page to edit mode. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Overview/CS/declarativeCatalogPartCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Overview/VB/declarativeCatalogPartVB.aspx#1)] 在程式碼範例的第三個部分是原始碼的兩個控制項。The third part of the code example is the source code for the two controls. 請注意，這些控制項的某些屬性會標示`WebBrowsable`屬性。Notice that some properties on these controls are marked with the `WebBrowsable` attribute. 這可讓動態產生使用者介面 (UI)，讓使用者編輯這些屬性，當控制項處於編輯模式的控制項。This enables the control to dynamically generate the user interface (UI) for a user to edit those properties when the controls are in edit mode. 屬性也會標有`WebDisplayName`屬性，來指定標籤編輯 UI 中的每個控制項旁邊顯示的文字。The properties are also marked with a `WebDisplayName` attribute, to specify the text of the label that appears next to each control in the editing UI. 若要執行程式碼範例，您必須編譯這個原始程式碼。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 您可以明確編譯它，然後將產生的組件放在您的網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以將原始程式碼放在您網站的 App_Code 資料夾中，這樣就會在執行階段進行動態編譯。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 如需示範這兩種編譯方法的逐步解說，請參閱 < [ 逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Overview/CS/userinfowebpart.cs#6)] [!code-vb[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Overview/VB/userinfowebpart.vb#6)] 當您載入瀏覽器中的時，選取**目錄模式**中**顯示模式**下拉式清單控制項，以切換到類別目錄的模式。When you load the page in a browser, select **Catalog Mode** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch to catalog mode. 在類別目錄模式中，您可以看到可新增至頁面的控制項。In catalog mode, you can see the controls that are available to be added to the page. 新增所有三個控制項，然後使用**顯示模式**返回頁面，即可瀏覽模式的下拉式清單。Add all three controls, and then use the **Display Mode** drop-down list to return the page to browse mode. 三個控制項出現在頁面上。The three controls appear on the page. 如果您使用**顯示模式**下拉式清單和參數的頁面，即可編輯模式，您可以按一下標題列中的動詞命令功能表 （向下箭號）**使用者資訊 WebPart**控制項，然後按一下**編輯**編輯控制項。If you use the **Display Mode** drop-down list and switch the page to edit mode, you can click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of the **User Information WebPart** control, and click **Edit** to edit the control. 編輯 UI 顯示時，您可以看到控制項。When the editing UI is visible, you can see the control. 請注意，每一個屬性的轉譯控制項`UserInfoWebPart`已標記為`WebBrowsable`屬性。Notice that a control is rendered for each of the properties of the `UserInfoWebPart` class that was marked with the `WebBrowsable` attribute. 如果您進行一些變更編輯 UI 並按一下**套用** 按鈕，您可以使用**顯示模式**返回頁面，即可瀏覽模式，並查看完整的編輯變更影響的下拉式清單。If you make some changes in the editing UI and click the **Apply** button, you can use the **Display Mode** drop-down list to return the page to browse mode and see the full effect of the editing changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式是預設值; 沒有建構函式中宣告類別，因此不特殊的工作會執行建立類別的新執行個體時。The constructor is a default; no constructor is declared in the class and hence no special tasks are carried out when a new instance of the class is created. .NET Framework 來建立類別的執行個體，請以在內部使用建構函式。The .NET Framework uses the constructor internally to create an instance of the class. 它是可行的但不太可能，您必須使用建構函式，以程式設計方式在您自己的程式碼中。It is possible, but unlikely, that you will need to use the constructor programmatically in your own code. 控制項的用途是將它新增至頁面以宣告方式在設計階段的網頁開發人員。The intended use of the control is for page developers to add it to a page declaratively at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性的成員身分控制項，未設定呈現控制項的 Web 組件控制項內任何位置使用。The property, as a member of the control, is not used anywhere within the Web Parts control set for rendering the control. 因此，您不應該使用這個屬性影響;設定具有不會影響轉譯。Therefore, you should not use this property; setting it has no effect on rendering. 若要防止開發人員使用這個屬性，程式碼屬性在其上設定為隱藏在 Visual Studio 中。To prevent developers from using this property, code attributes are set on it to hide it in Visual Studio. 當您使用在 Visual Studio 中的控制項屬性不是顯示在 [屬性] 窗格或 IntelliSense。When you work with a control in Visual Studio, the property is not visible in the Properties pane or IntelliSense. 如果您想要使用這個屬性，您需要建立自訂的類別繼承自類別。If you want to use this property, you need to create a custom class that inherits from the class. 自訂的類別可以使用繼承作為它的屬性，或覆寫它，並改變行為。The custom class can either use the inherited property as it is, or override it and change its behavior. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性的成員身分控制項，未設定呈現控制項的 Web 組件控制項內任何位置使用。The property, as a member of the control, is not used anywhere within the Web Parts control set for rendering the control. 因此，您不應該使用這個屬性影響;設定具有不會影響轉譯。Therefore, you should not use this property; setting it has no effect on rendering. 若要防止開發人員使用這個屬性，程式碼屬性在其上設定為隱藏在 Visual Studio 中。To prevent developers from using this property, code attributes are set on it to hide it in Visual Studio. 當您使用在 Visual Studio 中的控制項屬性不是顯示在 [屬性] 窗格或 IntelliSense。When you work with a control in Visual Studio, the property is not visible in the Properties pane or IntelliSense. 如果您想要使用這個屬性，您需要建立自訂的類別繼承自類別。If you want to use this property, you need to create a custom class that inherits from the class. 自訂的類別可以使用繼承作為它的屬性，或覆寫它，並改變行為。The custom class can either use the inherited property as it is, or override it and change its behavior. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性的成員身分控制項，未設定呈現控制項的 Web 組件控制項內任何位置使用。The property, as a member of the control, is not used anywhere within the Web Parts control set for rendering the control. 因此，您不應該使用這個屬性影響;設定具有不會影響轉譯。Therefore, you should not use this property; setting it has no effect on rendering. 若要防止開發人員使用這個屬性，程式碼屬性在其上設定為隱藏在 Visual Studio 中。To prevent developers from using this property, code attributes are set on it to hide it in Visual Studio. 當您使用在 Visual Studio 中的控制項屬性不是顯示在 [屬性] 窗格或 IntelliSense。When you work with a control in Visual Studio, the property is not visible in the Properties pane or IntelliSense. 如果您想要使用這個屬性，您需要建立自訂的類別繼承自類別。If you want to use this property, you need to create a custom class that inherits from the class. 自訂的類別可以使用繼承作為它的屬性，或覆寫它，並改變行為。The custom class can either use the inherited property as it is, or override it and change its behavior. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提供實作抽象的基底方法宣告中類別。The method provides an implementation for the abstract base method declared in the class. 方法會傳回目錄中的每個控制項的描述資訊。The method returns description information for each control in a catalog. A物件是包含的相關基本資訊的物件控制項，包括其識別碼、 控制和繼承自數個重要的屬性值的物件參考類別，例如和。A object is an object that contains essential information about a control, including its ID, an object reference to the control, and the values of several important properties that are inherited from the class, such as and . 方法可以改善效能。The method improves performance. 建立目錄時，它必須包含，包括標題、 描述、 圖示 （如果有的話） 和識別碼。 每個控制項的一些資訊When a catalog is created, it needs some information about each control it contains, including a title, a description, an icon (if one exists), and an ID. 而不必建立要取得這項資訊，每個控制項的執行個體呼叫會建立目錄的區域將位於目錄中和呼叫每個控制項的方法會傳回只描述資訊控制項。Rather than having to create an instance of each control to get this information, a zone that creates a catalog calls the method for each control that will be in the catalog, and the call returns only the description information for the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 方法。The following code example shows how to use the method. 這個範例包含四個部分：This example has four parts: - 使用者控制項，可讓您變更 Web 組件頁面上的顯示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 原始程式碼檔，其中包含兩個自訂控制項。A source code file that contains two custom controls. - 包含網頁控制項和參考數個伺服器控制項的控制項。A Web page that contains a control and a control that references several server controls. 這個頁面也會包含呼叫的事件處理程式碼方法。The page also contains the event-handling code that calls the method. - 在瀏覽器頁面載入時，此範例的運作方式的說明。An explanation of how the example works when you load the page in a browser. 此程式碼範例的第一個部分是可讓使用者變更顯示模式，在網頁上的使用者控制項。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. For 詳細資料會顯示在此控制項模式和原始碼的描述，請參閱[逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上顯示的模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Get#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Get/CS/DisplayModeMenuCS.ascx#7)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Get#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Get/VB/DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx#7)] 在程式碼範例的第二個部分是兩個自訂的原始碼控制項。The second part of the code example is the source code for the two custom controls. 若要執行程式碼範例，您必須編譯這個原始程式碼。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 您可以明確編譯它，然後將產生的組件放在您的網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以將原始程式碼放在您網站的 App_Code 資料夾中，這樣就會在執行階段進行動態編譯。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 如需示範這兩種編譯方法的逐步解說，請參閱 < [ 逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Get#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Get/CS/userinfowebpart.cs#6)] [!code-vb[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Get#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Get/VB/userinfowebpart.vb#6)] 此範例的第三個部分是網頁，其中包含控制項。The third part of the example is the Web page that contains the control. 請注意，`Button1_Click`方法呼叫方法，可取得的描述控制在目錄中，並寫出到標籤的詳細資料。Notice that the `Button1_Click` method calls the method, obtains the descriptions of the controls in the catalog, and writes out the details to a label. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Get#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Get/CS/declarativeCatalogPart_GetCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Get#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Get/VB/declarativeCatalogPart_GetVB.aspx#1)] 當您載入瀏覽器中的時，選取**目錄模式**中**顯示模式**下拉式清單控制項，以切換到類別目錄的模式。When you load the page in a browser, select **Catalog Mode** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch to catalog mode. 在類別目錄模式中，您可以看到可新增至頁面的控制項。In catalog mode, you can see the controls that are available to be added to the page. 您可以按一下**顯示 web 組件描述**寫入目錄中之控制項的相關詳細資料標籤 按鈕。You can click the **Display WebPart descriptions** button to write the details about the controls in the catalog to the label.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳回參考控制項，其描述的詳細資料符合的值物件傳遞至方法。The method returns a reference to a control whose description details match the values of the object passed into the method. 一般而言，這個方法可搭配使用時方法，用來擷取目錄中的所有控制項的描述。Typically, this method is used together with the method, which is used to retrieve the descriptions of all the controls in the catalog. 個別控制項可以再擷取或操作所傳遞個別物件到方法。Individual controls can then be retrieved or manipulated as needed by passing individual objects to the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 方法。The following code example shows how to use the method. 這個範例包含四個部分：This example has four parts: - 使用者控制項，可讓您變更 Web 組件頁面上的顯示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 原始程式碼檔，其中包含兩個自訂控制項。A source code file that contains two custom controls. - 包含網頁控制項和參考數個伺服器控制項的控制項。A Web page that contains a control and a control that references several server controls. 這個頁面也會包含呼叫的事件處理程式碼方法。The page also contains the event-handling code that calls the method. - 在瀏覽器頁面載入時，此範例的運作方式的說明。An explanation of how the example works when you load the page in a browser. 此程式碼範例的第一個部分是可讓使用者變更顯示模式，在網頁上的使用者控制項。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. For 詳細資料會顯示在此控制項模式和原始碼的描述，請參閱[逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上顯示的模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Get#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Get/CS/DisplayModeMenuCS.ascx#7)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Get#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Get/VB/DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx#7)] 在程式碼範例的第二個部分是兩個自訂的原始碼控制項。The second part of the code example is the source code for the two custom controls. 若要執行程式碼範例，您必須編譯這個原始程式碼。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 您可以明確編譯它，然後將產生的組件放在您的網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以將原始程式碼放在您網站的 App_Code 資料夾中，這樣就會在執行階段進行動態編譯。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 如需示範這兩種編譯方法的逐步解說，請參閱 < [ 逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Get#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Get/CS/userinfowebpart.cs#6)] [!code-vb[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Get#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Get/VB/userinfowebpart.vb#6)] 此範例的第三個部分是網頁，其中包含控制項。The third part of the example is the Web page that contains the control. 請注意，`Button2_Click`方法取得的說明控制項，在目錄中，呼叫方法來擷取符合集合中第三個控制項的描述，並將新增至該控制項的控制項提供的頁面。Notice that the `Button2_Click` method obtains the descriptions of the controls in the catalog, calls the method to retrieve a control that matches the description of the third control in the collection, and then adds that control to the page. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Get#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Get/CS/declarativeCatalogPart_GetCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Get#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_Get/VB/declarativeCatalogPart_GetVB.aspx#1)] 當您載入瀏覽器中的時，選取**目錄模式**中**顯示模式**下拉式清單控制項，以切換到類別目錄的模式。When you load the page in a browser, select **Catalog Mode** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch to catalog mode. 在類別目錄模式中，您可以看到可新增至頁面的控制項。In catalog mode, you can see the controls that are available to be added to the page. 如果您按一下**新增 TextDisplayWebPart** 按鈕，控制項時，會加入至頁面上，而不需要將它新增到一般的目錄使用者介面 (UI)。If you click the **Add TextDisplayWebPart** button, the control is added to the page without your having to add it through the normal catalog user interface (UI). 使用**顯示模式**頁面返回標準瀏覽模式的下拉式清單; 您加入會在網頁上可見的控制項。Use the **Display Mode** drop-down list to return the page to normal browse mode; the control you added is visible on the page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性的成員身分控制項，未設定呈現控制項的 Web 組件控制項內任何位置使用。The property, as a member of the control, is not used anywhere within the Web Parts control set for rendering the control. 因此，您不應該使用這個屬性影響;設定具有不會影響轉譯。Therefore, you should not use this property; setting it has no effect on rendering. 若要防止開發人員使用這個屬性，程式碼屬性在其上設定為隱藏在 Visual Studio 中。To prevent developers from using this property, code attributes are set on it to hide it in Visual Studio. 當您使用在 Visual Studio 中的控制項屬性不是顯示在 [屬性] 窗格或 IntelliSense。When you work with a control in Visual Studio, the property is not visible in the Properties pane or IntelliSense. 如果您想要使用這個屬性，您需要建立自訂的類別繼承自類別。If you want to use this property, you need to create a custom class that inherits from the class. 自訂的類別可以使用繼承作為它的屬性，或覆寫它，並改變行為。The custom class can either use the inherited property as it is, or override it and change its behavior. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

summary.span: Gets or sets the title that appears in the control's title bar.

span.span: Gets or sets the title that appears in the control's title bar.

value.span: 字串，做為控制項的標題。

span.span: A string that is used as the title of the control.

value.span: 預設值是 Web 組件控制集所提供的計算的控制項名稱。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性值會顯示在標題列控制控制項時顯示在目錄模式。The property value is displayed in the title bar of a control when the control is visible in catalog mode. 在頁面中宣告控制項時，您可以透過設定屬性的值`Title`屬性。When the control is declared in a page, you can set a value for the property by using the `Title` attribute. 如果您未提供標題的值，特定文化特性的預設值用來描述這個控制項可讓使用者編輯的屬性類型。If you do not supply a value for the title, a culture-specific default value is used to describe the kind of properties that this control allows users to edit. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以宣告方式使用的屬性。The following code example demonstrates the declarative use of the property. 完整的程式碼才能執行範例時，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 此範例示範如何設定在宣告式標記的控制項上的屬性。This example shows how to set the property on the control in declarative markup. 如果您未設定屬性，或如果您將指派為空字串 ("")，會提供預設標題。If you do not set the property, or if you assign an empty string ("") , a default title is supplied. summary.span: Gets or sets the path to a user control that contains a list of or other server controls for the catalog.

span.span: Gets or sets the path to a user control that contains a list of or other server controls for the catalog.

value.span: 使用者控制項，其中包含一組的路徑字串或伺服器控制項。

span.span: A string with the path to a user control that contains a set of or server controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓開發人員指定的使用者控制項，包含一組的路徑或其他伺服器控制項加入至區域。The property enables developers to specify the path to a user control that contains a set of or other server controls that can be added to a zone. 如果使用者控制項的有效路徑指派給這個屬性時，控制會自動新增至目錄，在編譯時期。If a valid path to a user control is assigned to this property, the controls are automatically added to the catalog at compile time. 屬性會很有用，因為它提供用來在封裝，並在許多不同的網頁或網站重複使用一組可用的控制項。The property can be useful because it provides a way to package and reuse a set of available controls across many different pages or sites. 而不是以手動方式宣告的每個頁面，想要提供目錄的目錄中的每個控制項，開發人員可以使用這個屬性指向使用者控制項所參考的一整組控制項。Rather than manually declaring each control in a catalog for every page that wants to provide a catalog, developers can use this property to point to a user control that references an entire set of controls. 此外，屬性可以用連同控制項中已明確宣告``網頁上的項目。Also, the property can be used along with controls that are explicitly declared within an `` element on a Web page. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性以宣告方式和程式設計的方式。The following code example shows how to use the property declaratively and programmatically. 此範例包含五個部分：This example has five parts: - 使用者控制項，可讓您變更 Web 組件頁面上的顯示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 原始程式碼檔，其中包含兩個自訂控制項。A source code file that contains two custom controls. - 另一個使用者控制項，包含參考自訂控制項，並參考在網頁上的屬性。Another user control that contains references to the custom controls, and is referenced by the property on the Web page. - 包含網頁控制項和參考包含自訂控制項中的使用者控制項的控制項。A Web page that contains a control and a control that references the user control containing the custom controls. - 在瀏覽器頁面載入時，此範例的運作方式的說明。An explanation of how the example works when you load the page in a browser. 此程式碼範例的第一個部分是可讓使用者變更顯示模式，在網頁上的使用者控制項。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. For 詳細資料會顯示在此控制項模式和原始碼的描述，請參閱[逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上顯示的模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_WebPartsList#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_WebPartsList/CS/DisplayModeMenuCS.ascx#7)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_WebPartsList#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_WebPartsList/VB/DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx#7)] 在程式碼範例的第二個部分是兩個自訂的原始碼控制項。The second part of the code example is the source code for the two custom controls. 若要執行程式碼範例，您必須編譯這個原始程式碼。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 您可以明確編譯它，然後將產生的組件放在您的網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以將原始程式碼放在您網站的 App_Code 資料夾中，這樣就會在執行階段進行動態編譯。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 如需示範這兩種編譯方法的逐步解說，請參閱 < [ 逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_WebPartsList#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_WebPartsList/CS/userinfowebpart.cs#6)] [!code-vb[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_WebPartsList#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_WebPartsList/VB/userinfowebpart.vb#6)] 在程式碼範例的第三個部分是包含自訂的使用者控制項控制項，並參考屬性。The third part of the code example is the user control that contains the custom controls, and is referenced by the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_WebPartsList#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_WebPartsList/CS/WebUserControlCS.ascx#5)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_WebPartsList#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_WebPartsList/VB/WebUserControlVB.ascx#5)] 此範例的第四個部分是網頁，其中包含控制項。The fourth part of the example is the Web page that contains the control. 請注意，中網頁的標記以宣告方式設定屬性; 屬性值也可以設定以程式設計方式在使用者按一下網頁目錄顯示模式時，會公開一個按鈕時。Notice that the property is set declaratively in the markup of the page; the property value can also be set programmatically when the user clicks a button that is exposed when the page is in catalog display mode. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_WebPartsList#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_WebPartsList/CS/declarativeCatalogPart_UserControlListCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_WebPartsList#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_DeclarativeCatalogPart_WebPartsList/VB/declarativeCatalogPart_UserControlListVB.aspx#1)] 當您載入瀏覽器中的時，選取**目錄模式**中**顯示模式**下拉式清單控制項，以切換到類別目錄的模式。When you load the page in a browser, select **Catalog Mode** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch to catalog mode. 在類別目錄模式中，您可以看到可新增至頁面的控制項。In catalog mode, you can see the controls that are available to be added to the page. 按一下 **更新 WebPartsListUserControlPath 屬性**按鈕，不會在文字方塊中輸入值。Click the **Update WebPartsListUserControlPath property** button, without entering a value in the text box. 請注意，使用空字串 ("") 指派給屬性，就會更新目錄，而且已明確宣告頁面中的控制項仍然會在類別目錄。Notice that with an empty string ("") assigned to the property, the catalog is updated and only the control that is explicitly declared in the page remains in the catalog. 如果您輸入的名稱，其中包含使用者控制項的控制項中文字方塊中，按一下**更新 WebPartsListUserControlPath 屬性**同樣地，按鈕屬性現在會指向使用者控制項同樣地，和其他控制項重新出現在目錄中。If you type the name of the user control that contains the controls in the text box, and click the **Update WebPartsListUserControlPath property** button again, the property now points to the user control again, and the additional controls reappear in the catalog.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性參考樣板，含有控制項在網頁上宣告為類別目錄的一部分。The property references the template that contains controls declared on a Web page as part of a catalog. 階層中的宣告式的項目內區域中，屬性由``項目，這是子元素的``項目，且包含中的所有明確宣告的伺服器控制項類別目錄。In the hierarchy of declarative elements within a zone, the property is represented by the `` element, which is a child element of the `` element, and contains all explicitly declared server controls in a catalog. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以宣告方式使用的屬性。The following code example demonstrates the declarative use of the property. 完整的程式碼才能執行範例時，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 此程式碼示範如何插入``內的項目``宣告式標記中的項目。This code shows how to insert the `` element within an `` element in declarative markup. remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性的成員身分控制項，未設定呈現控制項的 Web 組件控制項內任何位置使用。The property, as a member of the control, is not used anywhere within the Web Parts control set for rendering the control. 因此，您不應該使用這個屬性影響;設定具有不會影響轉譯。Therefore, you should not use this property; setting it has no effect on rendering. 若要防止開發人員使用這個屬性，程式碼屬性在其上設定為隱藏在 Visual Studio 中。To prevent developers from using this property, code attributes are set on it to hide it in Visual Studio. 當您使用在 Visual Studio 中的控制項屬性不是顯示在 [屬性] 窗格或 IntelliSense。When you work with a control in Visual Studio, the property is not visible in the Properties pane or IntelliSense. 如果您想要使用這個屬性，您需要建立自訂的類別繼承自類別。If you want to use this property, you need to create a custom class that inherits from the class. 自訂的類別可以使用繼承作為它的屬性，或覆寫它，並改變行為。The custom class can either use the inherited property as it is, or override it and change its behavior. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
